results.title: Cold War III
results.overview: The follow-up to the movies "Cold War" (2012) - and "Cold War II" (2016)

results.title: Enter The Fat Dragon
results.overview: A Remake Of ENTER THE FAT DRAGON - Directed By KENJI TANIGAKI - Starring DONNIE YEN

results.title: Dhrushti
results.overview: A photographer's life, who is  temporarily wheelchair driven, goes into deep trouble, once he  witnesses a murder through his camera.

results.title: The Sardonic Smile
results.overview: Following the mysterious death of a fellow hiker, four friends hauled up in a remote cabin begin to recall their strange encounters with a smiling man whilst out on the trails.

results.title: A Última Chance
results.overview: Based on the life of the inmate and Brazilian muay thai champion Fabio Leão. Born in Vila Kennedy, a suburb in Rio de Janeiro, Fabio was involved in drug trafficking and banditry since the age of 14. In prison, his redeeming passion as a teenager for the ring led him to teach sports to fellow inmates. Everything blends in with his love story for Luciana, a lifelong partner.

results.title: Suburban Cowboy
results.overview: Suburban Cowboy follows a drug dealer on Long Island who finds himself over his head when one of his soldiers robs a connection to ruthless Serbian gangsters. When the debt falls on his shoulders he is forced to take drastic measures.

results.title: Rapid Eye Movement
results.overview: A publicity seeking radio DJ is driven to the edge of insanity when he attempts to break the 11 day world record for staying awake-under the threat of a deranged caller who will kill him if he falls asleep.

results.title: Ryeohaeng
results.overview: A group of women climbs a summer mountain situated in South Korea. They are refugees who have settled into South Korean society after fleeing from North Korea. For them, climbing the mountains has been an unavoidable journey for survival - a matter of life and death.

results.title: HAGER
results.overview: After his colleague Schweitzer goes missing during a drug raid, undercover cop Till Hager is tasked with tracking down a mysterious new drug called "Abaddon" - a substance which supposedly drags it's users down the deepest depths of hell.

results.title: Through Black Glass
results.overview: The story of a blind girl whose fate presents a unique chance. A wealthy man is ready to give her sight if she blindly becomes his wife. This gift reveals to the heroine the cruel truth of life ...

results.title: Filmfarsi
results.overview: A found-footage essay, Filmfarsi salvages low budget thrillers and melodramas suppressed following the 1979 Islamic revolution.

results.title: Meat Stew, Original Recipe
results.overview: A dysfunctional family reunites after the grandmother's death, who was a famous cooker of the traditional mexican dish: mole de olla.

results.title: Axel the Hero
results.overview: Axel lives in a poor village where people work days at the chicken farm and gamble their last pennies at night. It's made Manne, the farm and casino owner, a very powerful man. Axel's debts are so great he has to do whatever Manne says. So he works in Manne's villa but can at least see his childhood love Jenny, who is now Manne's girlfriend. Axel seeks refuge in his imagination. He has rebuilt the entire village as a model in his cottage. Here, he is king, his word is law. Here, he saves Jenny from Manne and sends him running. One day Axel finds a friend, his neighbor Heiner, a strange guy who constantly quotes Karl May and talks happily with his chicken. Only by joining forces will they bring Manne's empire crashing down.

results.title: Guna 369
results.overview: Guna is a happy-go-lucky guy who believes the solution to solving issues is not through violence but through compromise.When he is framed for a crime he didn't commit by someone close to him, Guna is left with no choice and forced to the extremes to prove his innocence.
